data.description: Simulate Dynamics with Springs and Friction
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a subclass of Physics::Springs (which in turn is a
    subclass of Physics::Particles). It allows particle simulations
    involving particles interactions (gravity, etc. implemented in
    Physics::Particles), springs (Physics::Springs), and force
    field-like external forces such as friction.

    Arguably friction is not a force field, but it can be simulated as
    such.
